'''Soloneldi''' is a [[Telerin]] word meaning "surf-singers", a term for [[Falmari|themselves]] (along with ''[[Fallinelli]]'').<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies|Etymologies]] p.387</ref>

==Etymology==
The first part derives from the [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[SOL]] (*''[[solo]]'') and the second from [[NYEL]] (*''[[neldi]]'').

==Other versions==
[[Solosimpi]] was Tolkien's older name of the Teleri.
